product_name: Overland Equipment Aurora Shoulder Bag - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Great for your urban adventure or daily commute, the Overland Equipment Aurora shoulder bag features tough, durable fabric and simple, elegant style that fits in anywhere. Roomy main compartment with zip closure easily holds folders, lunch, a book and all your other daily essentials. Large stash pocket fits folders and other documents; small stash pocket with button snap closure holds small items within easy reach. Small zippered pocket with fleece lining protects your cell phone or sunglasses from scratches. Ballistic ripstop nylon fabric is tough, durable and weather- and abrasion-resistant. Adjustable shoulder strap on the Overland Equipment Aurora shoulder bag allows easy carrying. Closeout.
short_description: Great for your urban adventure or daily commute, the Overland Equipment Aurora shoulder bag features tough, durable fabric and simple, elegant style that fits in anywhere.
